Usefull SQL Snippets

Informix DESC:
SELECT TRIM || ‘.’ || TRIM AS table_dot_column
FROM “informix”.systables AS t, “informix”.syscolumns AS c
WHERE t.tabid = c.tabid
AND t.tabtype = ‘T’
AND t.tabid >= 100
ORDER BY t.tabname, c.colno;
